variable.name: otherloc

variable.name: bone
variable.comment: This data is self report. There is a possibility that there are duplicate fractures that have different years, but are really the same fracture. Use with caution. version 1 9-17-2009: Use along with reviewed and validated fracture data set: ofsfx1_2005s.
